description: Mint and lemon juice add zest to this simple sauté. A proper julienne cut results in pieces the size of a small wooden matchstick, about 1 1/2 inches long and 1/8 inch thick.
directions: Add the oil to a skillet or sauté pan over medium-high heat. Sauté the carrot for 2 to 3 minutes, until almost tender. Add the zucchini and scallion and continue to sauté for 2 to 4 minutes longer. Grind in black pepper to taste and remove the pan from the heat. Add the lemon juice, mint, and salt to taste. Serve immediately.

html.directions: Add the oil to a skillet or sauté pan over medium-high heat. Sauté the carrot for 2 to 3 minutes, until almost tender. Add the zucchini and scallion and continue to sauté for 2 to 4 minutes longer. Grind in black pepper to taste and remove the pan from the heat. Add the lemon juice, mint, and salt to taste. Serve immediately.
html.ingredients:
1 Tbs. olive oil

2 cups julienned carrot

4 cups julienned green zucchini

4 scallions, thinly sliced on the diagonal

Freshly ground black pepper

2 Tbs. fresh lemon juice

1/2 cup minced fresh mint

Salt
html.nutrition: 90 cal, 4g fat, 35mg sodium, 5g fiber

name: Zucchini with zip
